6 class EngineException : public LibCryptoSecException
7 {
8 public:
9  enum ErrorCode
10  {
11  UNKNOWN,
12  INVALID_ENGINE,
13  INIT_FAILED,
14  KEY_NOT_FOUND,
15  ADD_ENGINE_TO_LIST,

17  DYNAMIC_ENGINE_UNAVAILABLE,
18  INTERNAL_ERROR,
19  ENGINE_NOT_FOUND,
20  SET_COMMAND,
21  LOAD_ENGINE_FAILED,
22  };
23  EngineException(std::string where)
24  {
25  this->where = where;
26  this->errorCode = EngineException::UNKNOWN;
27  this->details = "";
28  }

39  this->details = details;

41  EngineException(EngineException::ErrorCode errorCode, std::string where, bool opensslDetails)
42  {
43  this->where = where;
44  this->errorCode = errorCode;
45  if (opensslDetails)
46  {
47  this->details = OpenSSLErrorHandler::getErrors();
48  }
49  else
50  {
51  this->details = "";
52  }
53  }
54  virtual ~EngineException() throw () {}
55  virtual std::string getMessage() const
56  {
57 // return (EngineException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode) + ". Details: " +details);
58  return EngineException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode);
59  }
60  virtual std::string toString() const
61  {
62  std::string ret;
63  if (this->errorCode == EngineException::UNKNOWN)
64  {
65  ret = "EngineException. Called by: " + this->where + ".";
66  }
67  else
68  {
69  ret = "EngineException: " + EngineException::errorCode2Message(this->errorCode) + ". Called by: " + this->where + ".";
70  }
71  if (this->details != "")
72  {
73  ret += " More details:\n" + this->details + ".";
74  }
75  return ret;
76  }
77  virtual EngineException::ErrorCode getErrorCode()
78  {
79  return this->errorCode;
80  }
81  static std::string errorCode2Message(EngineException::ErrorCode errorCode)
82  {
83  std::string ret;
84  switch (errorCode)
85  {
86  case EngineException::UNKNOWN:
87  ret = "Unknown error";
88  break;
89  case EngineException::INIT_FAILED:
90  ret = "Engine initialization failed";
91  break;
92  case EngineException::KEY_NOT_FOUND:
93  ret = "Key id not found";
94  break;
95  case EngineException::ADD_ENGINE_TO_LIST:
96  ret = "Adding engine to engines list";
97  break;
98  case EngineException::REMOVE_ENGINE_FROM_LIST:
99  ret = "Removing engine from engines list";
100  break;
101  case EngineException::DYNAMIC_ENGINE_UNAVAILABLE:
102  ret = "Dynamic engine is not available";
103  break;
104  case EngineException::INTERNAL_ERROR:
105  ret = "Internal error";
106  break;
107  case EngineException::ENGINE_NOT_FOUND:
108  ret = "Engine not found";
109  break;
110  case EngineException::SET_COMMAND:
111  ret = "Setting command";
112  break;
113  case EngineException::INVALID_ENGINE:
114  ret = "Invalid engine";
115  break;
116  case EngineException::LOAD_ENGINE_FAILED:
117  ret = "Load engine failed";
118  break;
119 // case EngineException:::
120 // ret = "";
121 // break;
122 // case EngineException:::
123 // ret = "";
124 // break;
125  }
126  return ret;
127  }
